metadata.title: Test Post
metadata.description: A test post for content authorship.

content.title: Welcome to the test post
content.introduction: You can load these posts and create new pages via the GitHub api in the /admin/ route (soon)
content.richtext:
Hello world!

This content was written in the lexical editor.

That's bold!

Or perhaps a bit slanted to the right.

Love that indent.

Aligned all the way to the center

Let's go to the right?

The title styles need work!

  • A list of bullet points
  • Another bullet point!
  • What's up with all these bullet points?
